snippet: MEYERS--Janet. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Janet Meyers, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Janet's beloved son Bob (Harriet); her grandchildren, Risa and Elana; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: MEYERS--Janet. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Janet Meyers, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Janet's beloved son Bob (Harriet); her grandchildren, Risa and Elana; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
